TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCParticleSystem extends Cocos2D.CCNode implements class Cocos2D.ICCBlendProtocol, class Cocos2D.ICCTextureProtocol

summary.para: Particle System base class. Attributes of a Particle System:

remarks.para: cocos2d also supports particles generated by Particle Designer (http://particledesigner.71squared.com/). 'Radius Mode' in Particle Designer uses a fixed emit rate of 30 hz. Since that can't be guaranteed in cocos2d, cocos2d uses a another approach, but the results are almost identical.
cocos2d supports all the variables used by Particle Designer plus a bit more:
It is possible to customize any of the above mentioned properties in runtime. Example:

item.description: radius direction (Radius mode) (Particle Designer supports outwards to inwards direction only)

remarks.description: radius direction (Radius mode) (Particle Designer supports outwards to inwards direction only)

Docs.summary: creates an initializes a ParticleSystem from a plist file. This plist files can be created manually or with Particle Designer: http://particledesigner.71squared.com/v2.0

public override float Rotation { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Sets the rotation (angle) of the node in degrees.

remarks.para: Sets the rotation (angle) of the node in degrees.
0 is the default rotation angle. Positive values rotate node clockwise, and negative values for anti-clockwise.

MemberSignature.Value: public override float Scale { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Changes both X and Y scale factor of the node.

remarks.para: Changes both X and Y scale factor of the node.
1.0 is the default scale factor. It modifies the X and Y scale at the same time.

MemberSignature.Value: public override float ScaleX { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Changes the scale factor on X axis of this node

remarks.para: Changes the scale factor on X axis of this node
The deafult value is 1.0 if you haven't changed it before

MemberSignature.Value: public override float ScaleY { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Changes the scale factor on Y axis of this node

remarks.para: Changes the scale factor on Y axis of this node
The Default value is 1.0 if you haven't changed it before.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StopSystem() cil managed

summary.para: stop emitting particles. Running particles will continue to run until they die
